titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: [Bayley filled up my 'Super–tax' statement as follows:–
Income £3000 + £3160 = £3160. Less Insurance £298.2.6, Mortgage £18 = £298.2.6. Net assessable income = £2843.17.6]

It was snowing when the curtains of my bed–room were drawn: Then it rained for most part of the day. Finally, it turned out to sunshine, though continuing very cold. I worked at the lecture on Magna Carta, wrote a sheaf of letters, & read the papers!
